alert.note: Alert for Barton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 14 at 6:58PM CDT until April 15 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN RICE AND EAST CENTRAL BARTON COUNTIES... At 658 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chase, or 7 miles east of Ellinwood, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter size hail 12 miles west of Lyons on Highway 56 at 657 PM. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chase, Bushton and Silica. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
